name: Cannon Ballz Blast
description:
Swipe and launch the cannon ballz to break the bricks.
Enjoy 1000+ stages gameplay using the combo system.
download now for free!

How to play
- Upgrade your cannon ballz.
- Swipe to launch the cannon ballz and hit the brick
- The brick breaks when durability drops to 0
- Break them all before bricks come all the way to bottom!

[Features]
- Colorful effect
- Various cannon ballz upgrades
- Easy to control
- Tons of stages
